channel.title: AriosRsps OSRS Content In HD!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://ariosrsps.com/lib/images/logo.png[/img][/center] [center]Now out of beta and fully playable! Join in on the highscore competition. [url=http://Ariosrsps.com] Website & Forums [/url] [url=http://ariosrsps.com/lib/live/arios-launcher.jar?v=1] Play Now (Download) [/url]
To register an account to play with, simply click the 'create account' button on the client. Choose a username and password and you are good to go.
[img]http://www.rune-server.org/static/avatar/admin.gif[/img][b][size=14pt]What is Arios?[/size][/b] Arios has been a developing server for four years. We excelled at being named the greatest remake server RSPS has ever witnessed.
After concurring the remake world we decided to take on a new characteristic to define our uniqueness.
A new era of Arios is before you, the time has come that we leap ahead to the HD world. We are offering you a new experience of Arios in HD brought to you with a mixture of unique OSRS updates.
Together we can create a new legacy for Arios as the #1 leading HD 2009/OSRS server, the only thing we need from you, is YOU!
[/center]
[center][b]Quick info & features:[/b] [spoiler]* The current XP rate is 20x. (Rate can be increased by voting and buying double XP with the free vote credits) (Arios Bonds are now Available! - You can either Redeem Double Xp for an hour, Get 30k Xp from a lamp, 10k-75k coins, and a clue scroll)
* The game has an actual economy. Items like whips and amulets of fury are valuable and not just common junk you'd see like on other servers. (Item prices are also expected to be realistic -- this means that whips are expected to be 1m-2m, not 150m, or 200k.)
* The Arios staff do not sell items under any circumstance. All items are legitimately earned in-game via monster drops, quests, etc or Certain items by spending voting points.
Game features: Music system Achievement diaries Grand Exchange High-quality bosses including the Corporeal Beast Random events Oldschool RS (OSRS) content in HD Distractions and Diversions Many traveling methods like gnome gliders and canoes High-quality skilling Gravestone system Ironman and Ultimate Ironman game modes Minigames: Barrows, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, God Wars, Mage Arena, Mage Training Arena, Pest Control, Puro Puro, Tzhaar Fight Caves, Duel Arena, Tzhaar Fight Pits, Warriors Guild Bosses: Giant Mole, King Black Dragon, Dagannoth Kings, Bork, God War Bosses, Chaos Elemental, Kalphite Queen,TzTok-Jad, Kraken, Corporal Beast Over 30 quests & more developed weekly All skilling with perfection emulation including construction All F2P area content! Achievement diaries Grand exchange Clue Scrolls Lootshare Random events Game & Combat sounds Boss Pets OSRS Items!
[b]Website Features:[/b]
Arios easily is the most integrated server out there. We have one account called an Arios account which contains all your information which allows access to our game servers & our website/forums.
Account management Custom forums Highscores Voting Monthly Vote Rewards Player Advertisments Account Registration Account Recovery Grand Exchange Database NPC Database Item Database
Live Streams show up on home page if you register your stream account, for all players to see whose live streaming the server! [img]http://puu.sh/jbwVy/17bc021eb8.png[/img]
[/spoiler][/center]
[center] [center] Fight a multitude of different and varying NPCs across the world[/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/w4Smlrf.png[/img][/center]
[center] Complete optional Achievement Diaries for unique rewards[/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Qj7vLOl.png[/img][/center]
[center]Defeat Bosses for Awesome Boss Pets![/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/tPk1cnc.png[/img][/center]
[center]Collect Arios Bonds to Get Xp Lamps, Clue scrolls, Coins, and Double Xp!!! [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZIlnVQg.png[/img]
Godwars Looks amazing in HD! [img]http://i.imgur.com/2UjJ3mB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oWwgXZh.png[/img]
Construction is Almost Finished! [img]http://i.imgur.com/Qq9hYa9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ECXOyK9.png[/img]
Grind your way to 99s! (smithing is a great money making skill!) [img]http://i.imgur.com/2UsLayQ.png[/img]
Complete Quests to get Quest Cape/ and beat requirements to wield Items! [img]http://i.imgur.com/faIRdwa.png[/img]
The world looks amazing in HD! especially with those OSRS Items! [img]http://i.imgur.com/jiZsCRi.png[/img]
Ironman in HD! [img]http://i.imgur.com/rvGcN9I.png[/img]
Warriors Guild is 100%, work for you dragon defender! [img]http://i.imgur.com/1u8E2EG.png[/img]
Slayer Points give you so many Options to choose from (Option to cancel out tasks so you dont have to get them again ) [img]http://puu.sh/iWyPh/c6bdaab45b.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/iWyOt/0cf3fb6c09.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/iWzpp/4bdaced13a.png[/img] [/center]
Seen enough? [url=http://ariosrsps.com/lib/live/arios-launcher.jar?v=1] Play Now [/url] To register an account to play with, simply click the 'create account' button on the client. Choose a username and password and you are good to go.
Need any questions in game? add me:[img]http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape2/images/d/db/Player_moderator_crown.png/revision/latest?cb=20111126211254[/img]R I C H I E

item.title: AriosRsps OSRS Content In HD!
item.dc:creator: @Layne_Staley Layne Staley
item.description:
@Layne_Staley wrote:

Hello Arios,

We have released a few updates, mostly quality of life. Much more coming over the next week!

[B]The Waterfall Quest[/B] has been fixed. Previously, you could not obtain Glarial’s amulet and urn from the chest and tomb, respectively. This has been fixed, and Clive has been removed from home.

[B]Dwarven rock cake[/B]'s are now a purchasable reward from the Vote shop! The cost is currently 100 credits, and is great for Dharok’s users. The old rock cake will continue to work but the minimum HP may be nerfed slightly(currently stops damaging at 30hp, may raise to 50hp). The new rock cake will work to 1HP, and will also do 5HP in damage per click when you have 6 or more HP remaining.

[B]Archers[/B], [B]Berserker[/B], [B]Warrior[/B] and [B]Seers[/B] imbued rings have been added to the Vote shop. You will need to trade an unimbued ring and 50 credits(Archers, Berserker, Seers) or 25 credits(Warrior) to obtain one.

[B]One-click banking[/B] has been implimented. To one click bank, simply left click any bank booth in Arios. It works almost identically to the Use-quickly option. To set a pin, or otherwise converse with a bank attendant, left click the Banker NPC. The “Use” and “Use-quickly” options will be fused in the future to make the “Bank” option.

More updates will be being pushed out over the next few days, so stay tuned! Please remember to be friendly to newcomers and encourage them to vote and participate in the bump contest for rewards!

Kind Regards,

Layne Staley

Read full topic

item.title: AriosRsps OSRS Content In HD!
item.dc:creator: @jedipeludo jedipeludo
item.description:
@jedipeludo wrote:

Great server, growing community, and it has a lot of potencial to become one of the top 25 server of runescape.

Try it before it’s too late, and with too late, i mean that you won’t be able to say “I USED TO PLAY ARIOS BEFORE IT WAS POPULAR” like the filthy hipster you are in a near future.

item.title: AriosRsps OSRS Content In HD!
item.dc:creator: @Layne_Staley Layne Staley
item.description:
@Layne_Staley wrote:

Just posting to let everyone know Arios is back up under new ownership. You may still login to your old accounts with no stat or items removed, save a Bandos and Godsword reset some months back.

Hope to see you in-game.

Kind Regards,

Layne Staley

Read full topic

item.title: AriosRsps OSRS Content In HD!
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

briney21:

this is like the 20th time this has come out lol everyone joins sees the low xp rate and then a week later realises hang on rs is just as fast and goes off then this shuts down a month later its back! lol

Well clearly rs rates are not as fast because we’re x20 The rs rate. And we’re coming out with multiple xp rates with separate hiscores for everyone’s needs. (X10,x20,x50,x100) are the new xp rates. And the sever only goes down due to past developers. But yes now it’s back vexia is more motivated than ever

Edit/OT: Today we bring you updates that many users have requested; Skilling Pets and Middle Mouse movement!

These skilling pets function exactly like they do on Oldschool RS, including their dialogues. You can obtain them via skilling, and the higher your skill level, the greater the chance of getting it. You can also transform a baby chinchompa between 4 different forms!

MAud1rL.png769×503

QMrDlt8.png704×254

Read full topic

item.description:
@xplode wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]Now out of beta and fully playable! Join in on the highscore competition.
Website & Forums
Play Now (Download)

To register an account to play with, simply click the ‘create account’ button on the client.
Choose a username and password and you are good to go.

[size=14pt]What is Arios?[/size]
Arios has been a developing server for four years. We excelled at being named the greatest remake server RSPS has ever witnessed.

After concurring the remake world we decided to take on a new characteristic to define our uniqueness.

A new era of Arios is before you, the time has come that we leap ahead to the HD world. We are offering you a new experience of Arios in HD brought to you with a mixture of unique OSRS updates.

Together we can create a new legacy for Arios as the #1 leading HD 2009/OSRS server, the only thing we need from you, is YOU!

[/center]

[center]Quick info & features:
[spoiler]* The current XP rate is 20x.
(Rate can be increased by voting and buying double XP with the free vote credits)
(Arios Bonds are now Available! - You can either Redeem Double Xp for an hour, Get 30k Xp from a lamp, 10k-75k coins, and a clue scroll)

  • The game has an actual economy. Items like whips and amulets of fury are valuable and not just common junk you’d see like on
    other servers.
    (Item prices are also expected to be realistic – this means that whips are expected to be 1m-2m, not 150m, or 200k.)

  • The Arios staff do not sell items under any circumstance.
    All items are legitimately earned in-game via monster drops, quests, etc or Certain items by spending voting points.

Game features:
Music system
Achievement diaries
Grand Exchange
High-quality bosses including the Corporeal Beast
Random events
Oldschool RS (OSRS) content in HD
Distractions and Diversions
Many traveling methods like gnome gliders and canoes
High-quality skilling
Gravestone system
Ironman and Ultimate Ironman game modes
Minigames: Barrows, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, God Wars, Mage Arena, Mage Training Arena, Pest Control, Puro Puro, Tzhaar Fight Caves, Duel Arena, Tzhaar Fight Pits, Warriors Guild
Bosses: Giant Mole, King Black Dragon, Dagannoth Kings, Bork, God War Bosses,
Chaos Elemental, Kalphite Queen,TzTok-Jad, Kraken, Corporal Beast
Over 30 quests & more developed weekly
All skilling with perfection emulation including construction
All F2P area content!
Achievement diaries
Grand exchange
Clue Scrolls
Lootshare
Random events
Game & Combat sounds
Boss Pets
OSRS Items!

Website Features:

Arios easily is the most integrated server out there. We have one account called an Arios account which contains all your information which allows access to our game servers & our website/forums.

Account management
Custom forums
Highscores
Voting

Live Streams show up on home page if you register your stream account, for all players to see whose live streaming the server!
